product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies WetFire Stove with Tinder - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Tipping the scales at just half an ounce, the Ultimate Survival Technologies WetFire(TM) Stove won't slow you down on ultralight backpacking adventures. Ideal for use on ultralight trips when warming food and beverages is all you need to do; also great as a backup stove for emergency use. Ultralight pot supports accommodate a variety of metal cups and pots (sold separately); pot supports fold together for compact storage. Stove uses WetFire(TM) Tinder cubes (included) to provide a hot flame that will continue to burn even in pouring rain. WetFire Tinder burns at more than 1,300degF and is non-toxic, odorless and smokeless. A single cube of WetFire Tinder placed on the stove platform will boil a cup of water in 5 - 6 min. Stove weighs 0.46 oz. and measures 3.1 x 1.75 x 1.25 when collapsed; each WetFire Tinder cube weighs 0.2 oz. Ultimate Survival Technologies WetFire(TM) Stove includes 2 cubes of WetFire Tinder and a reusable storage bag; additional WetFire Tinder cubes are sold separately. Closeout.
short_description: Tipping the scales at just half an ounce, the Ultimate Survival Technologies WetFire(TM) Stove won't slow you down on ultralight backpacking adventures.
